name: Separating Balls
description:
Have you heard the phrase "Cut one Head off, two more shall take it's place"?

Well, this difficult game takes that into consideration.

Start dodging various flying Red Balls or be hit to Shrink and SEPARATE.

Have fun.

Made for Gdevelop's 3rd Game Jam!

Liluo Link: https://liluo.io/games/2978a929-d6b0-4acc-ba3c-f26921dec67a

This game is experimental, quite buggy and takes time to get used to controls. Made by Mikayeel.

Play full screen please for a less buggy experience.

I have removed the downloadable versions as I think they are more buggy. If you own one I suggest you delete the game and just play the web version. sorry for any inconveniences.
